attributes.action: Fine tune anti-terrorist legislation, and possibly use more intelligently mature personnel in this field, so that people intending to carry out terrorist activity can be identified but ordinary citizens can go about thier business unmolested.  This would demonstrate the applicability of true democracy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We abhor the random use of high tech equipment by the police and others. This can be very distressing and invades the privacy of individuals. We know how useful this equipment can be, but great consideration must take place before it is used and those using it must be made accountable.  We know how difficult it must be, faced with the terrorist threat, but come on Tony, it is possible with just a little more thought to show what a truly great nation this is.
